modName: Blacksmiths Guild - Witcher 2 Models by Lord of War
summary: Adds Lord of War\'s Witcher 2 Model Armours to the Blacksmiths\' Guild at Lord of War\'s dedicated Master Forge - no more crafting menu clutter!
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=yellow][size=+2]Lord of War\'s Witcher 2 Armour Models at The Blacksmiths\' Guild[/color][/size]


[color=orange][size=+1]*****Eliminates crafting menu clutter by placing items into their own exclusive forge*****[/color][/size]


[color=red][size=+1]*****This mod is a crafting .esp only and contains no armour meshes/textures!!!!***** [/color][/size][/center]

[size=+1]How does it work?[/size] 

[color=orange][size=+1]1)[/color][/size] Download/Install/NMM Blacksmiths\' Guild Core Mod
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17524] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17524[/url]

[color=orange][size=+1]2)[/color][/size] Download/Install/NMM from The Witcher 2 Models  
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5588] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5588[/url]
- Geralt Heavy Jacket
- Geralt Seltkirk Armor
- Iorveth Male and Female V.07
- Letho the Kings Slayer Armor V.06
- Northern Kingdoms Heavy Plate Armor V.08
- Saskia Male and Female

[color=orange][size=+1]3)[/color][/size] Download/Install/NMM the SG_LordOfWar file from this page here . . . the one you\'re on now . . . 

[color=orange][size=+1]4)[/color][/size] De-activate/Uncheck Lord of War\'s files
- GeraltJacket.esp
- TH3WICK3D1-GeraltSeltkirkArmor.esp 
- TH3WICK3D1-NorthernKingdomsHeavyPlate.esp
- Iorveth.esp 
- King\'s Slayer Armor.esp
- Saskia.esp
 
this step will: 
-	keep Lord of War\'s meshes/textures \'in the background\'
-	eliminate the mis-matched material types/stats from the original files

[color=orange][size=+1]5)[/color][/size] Confirm my SG_LordOfWar.esp is Activated/Checked
this step will:
-	allow my .esp to access Lord of War\'s meshes/textures
-	add Lord of War\'s Armours to Lord of War\'s Forge at the Blacksmiths\' Guild
-	distribute Lord of War\'s Armours across these crafting categories 
---	LaValette Heavy Plate Armour -  Heavy - Steel
---              Temerian Heavy Plate Armour - Heavy - Steel Plate
---              Flaming Rose Heavy Plate Armour - Heavy - Orcish
---              Redanian Heavy Plate Armour - Heavy - Ebony
---              Aedirnian Heavy Plate Armour- Heavy - Dragon Plate
---              Geralt\'s Leather Armour - Light - Leather (Steel Perk needed!)
---              Iorveth (Scoia\'tael) Armour - Light - Elven 
---              Saskia Armour - Light - Scaled
---              Letho (King Slayer) Armour - Light - Glass
---              Geralt\'s Seltkirk Armour - Light - Glass
-	add a light sprinkling of Lord of War\'s Armours to the Bandit and Bandit Boss levelled lists

----------------------------------

[size=+1][color=red]Notes:[/size][/color]
1) The Heavy Plate Helmet looks the same for all Heavy Plate Armour sets. It is, however, given the correct stats for the Matching Set Perk within each Armour Set.
2) Only Saskia and Iorveth (Scoia\'tael) Armours have female specific versions; all other Armour sets use the Male models.  Apologies Ladies, you will look slighty \'heavy set\', but at least you do have something to wear!
3) There is no headwear for:
- Saskia Scaled Armour set - use the Scaled Leather Hood from Alpha Wolf\'s Master Forge for a \'Matching Set\' 
- Seltkirk (Glass) Armour set - use either the Blasphemer\'s Hood or Thyssen\'s Hood from Alpha Wolf\'s Master Forge for a \'Matching Set\'
- Letho/King Slayer (Glass) Armour set - use either the Blasphemer\'s Hood or Thyssen\'s Hood from Alpha Wolf\'s Master Forge for a \'Matching Set\'

----------------------------------

[size=+1][color=red]Known Issues:[/size][/color]
1) The boots used with the Iorveth and Saskia Armours will not be visible if you equip them when your are otherwise \'naked\'; they do \'fill-in\' gaps around the feet left from their respective Cuirass\' when equipped with the Cuirass.  Equipping them will add the armour points etc.
2) There is minor clipping around the elbows (right worse than left) when equipping the Saskia Scaled Gloves; all other glove oprions clipped even worse!
3) Letho\'s (King Slayer) Cloak uses Slot 55 when being equipped - this clashes with the \'Right/Back\' bags from Dragten\'s Bandoliers, Bags and Pouches, therefore, you must choose between the Cloak and the Satchel etc.
4) Geralt\'s Seltkirk Cuirass has the Sword Belt/Bandolier \'built-in\'; this may clip [u]heavily[/u] with the standalone Sword Belts from Alpha Wolf\'s Master Forge

-----------------------------------

[size=+1][color=orange]Change Log:[/size][/color]
V.1.00 - Original upload (May 30, 2012)

----------------------------------

[size=+1][color=orange]PERMISSIONS[/size][/color]

The Lord of War is the owner of the intellectual property for porting the assets presented here - I only added the \'crafting/improving.\' 

The Wicked One is the owner of the intellectual property for the original \'craftabilty\' of the assets presented here - I only adjusted the \'crafting/improving.\' 

Feel free to open up my .esp and play with it for your own [i]personal use[/i]; [u]do not[/u] re-upload anything, anywhere, without a PM to me to discuss first.

Check with The Lord of War for any queries about the meshes/textures.

-------------------------------------------

[size=+1][color=orange]CREDITS[/size][/color]

The Lord of War - this really is The Wicked One\'s port!!!
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5588]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5588[/url]

author: NordHammer
